ui.panel.config.introduction: Di sini memungkinkan untuk mengkonfigurasi komponen dan 牧养犬. Meskipun semuanya belum dapat dikonfigurasikan melalui UI, akan tetapi kami sedang mengusahakannya.

ui.panel.config.area_registry.caption: Registry Area
ui.panel.config.area_registry.descriptio: Gambaran umum semua area di rumah Anda.
ui.panel.config.area_registry.picker.int: Areas are used to organize where devices are. This information will be used throughout 牧养犬 to help you in organizing your interface, permissions and integrations with other systems.
To place devices in an area, use the link below to navigate to the integrations page and then click on a configured integration to get to the device cards.

ui.panel.config.core.description: Memvalidasi file konfigurasi anda dan mengontrol server
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.introd: Merubah konfigurasi bisa menjadi proses yang melelahkan. Kami tahu. Bagian ini akan mencoba membuatnya menjadi sedikit lebih mudah.
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.core_c: Editor disabled because config stored in configuration.yaml.
Name of your 牧养犬 installation
ui.panel.config.core.section.server_cont: Validasikan konfigurasi anda jika anda baru saja membuat beberapa perubahan pada konfigurasi anda dan ingin memastikan semuanya valid
Beberapa bagian 牧养犬 dapat memuat ulang tanpa memerlukan restart. Menekan tombol reload akan membatalkan konfigurasi sekarang dan memuat konfigurasi yang baru.
Kontrol server 牧养犬 anda ... dari 牧养犬.
ui.panel.config.server_control.caption: Server Control
ui.panel.config.server_control.descripti: Restart and stop the 牧养犬 server
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.v: Validate your configuration if you recently made some changes to your configuration and want to make sure that it is all valid
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.r: Some parts of 牧养犬 can reload without requiring a restart. Hitting reload will unload their current configuration and load the new one.

ui.panel.config.customize.caption: Penyesuaian
ui.panel.config.customize.picker.introdu: Tweak per-entity attributes. Added/edited customizations will take effect immediately. Removed customizations will take effect when the entity is updated.
ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Otomasi
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: Editor otomasi memungkinkan Anda untuk membuat dan mengedit otomasi. Silakan baca [petunjuk](https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/editor/) untuk memastikan bahwa Anda telah mengonfigurasi 牧养犬 dengan benar.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.no_aut: Kami tidak dapat menemukan otomasi yang dapat diedit
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.introd: Gunakan otomasi untuk menghidupkan rumah Anda
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.load_e: Only automations in automations.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.unsave: Anda memiliki perubahan yang belum disimpan. Anda yakin ingin keluar?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.trigge: Pemicu adalah apa yang memulai pemrosesan pengaturan otomasi. Adalah mungkin untuk menentukan beberapa pemicu untuk aturan yang sama. Setelah pemicu dimulai, 牧养犬 akan memvalidasi Kondisi, jika ada, dan memanggil tindakan.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.condit:
Kondisi merupakan bagian opsional dari aturan otomasi dan dapat digunakan untuk mencegah Event terjadi saat dipicu. Kondisi terlihat sangat mirip dengan pemicu tetapi sangat berbeda. Pemicu akan melihat peristiwa yang terjadi di sistem sementara kondisi hanya melihat bagaimana sistem terlihat sekarang. Pemicu dapat mengamati bahwa saklar sedang dinyalakan. Suatu kondisi hanya dapat melihat apakah switch sedang aktif atau tidak aktif. 

[Pelajari lebih lanjut tentang kondisi.](https://home-assistant.io/docs/scripts/conditions/)
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.action:
Aksi adalah apa yang 牧养犬 akan lakukan ketika otomasi terpicu.

[Pelajari lebih lanjut tentang aksi.](https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/action/)

ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Cloud Login
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: 牧养犬 Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of 牧养犬 and Hass.io.
牧养犬 Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.

ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_passwo: You need to change your password before logging in.

ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Create an account to start your free one month trial with 牧养犬 Cloud. No payment information necessary.
The trial will give you access to all the benefits of 牧养犬 Cloud, including:

ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Thank you for being part of 牧养犬 Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integrations for 牧养犬 Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your 牧养犬 instance publicly on the internet.

ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the 牧养犬 skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, 牧养犬 will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for 牧养犬 Cloud you'll be able to control all your 牧养犬 devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the 牧养犬 skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: If you enable state reporting, 牧养犬 will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Please enter a pin to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this pin when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.

ui.panel.config.entity_registry.caption: Entity Registry
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.picker.i: 牧养犬 keeps a registry of every entity it has ever seen that can be uniquely identified. Each of these entities will have an entity ID assigned which will be reserved for just this entity.

Use the entity registry to override the name, change the entity ID or remove the entry from 牧养犬. Note, removing the entity registry entry won't remove the entity. To do that, follow the link below and remove it from the integrations page.

ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.e: Disabled entities will not be added to 牧养犬.

ui.panel.config.zha.network_management.i: Commands that affect the entire network
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.head: Device Management
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.intr: Run ZHA commands that affect a single device. Pick a device to see a list of available commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.hint: Note: Sleepy (battery powered) devices need to be awake when executing commands against them. You can generally wake a sleepy device by triggering it.
Some devices such as Xiaomi sensors have a wake up button that you can press at ~5 second intervals that keep devices awake while you interact with them.
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.help: Select a device to view per-device options.
ui.panel.config.zha.clusters.help_cluste: Select a cluster to view attributes and commands.

ui.panel.config.zwave.caption: Z-Wave
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_management: Run commands that affect the Z-Wave network. You won't get feedback on whether most commands succeeded, but you can check the OZW Log to try to find out.
ui.panel.config.zwave.ozw_log.introducti: View the log. 0 is the minimum (loads entire log) and 1000 is the maximum. Load will show a static log and tail will auto update with the last specified number of lines of the log.
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_status.net: This may take a while depending on the size of your network.
Awake nodes have been queried. Sleeping nodes will be queried when they wake.
